bill_title: to affirm the right of a parent to have a child born without consulting or utilizing a practitioner of the healing art.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to affirm the right of a parent to have a child born without consulting or utilizing a practitioner of the healing art. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 36-2 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Nothing in this title limits the right of a parent to give birth to a child without consulting or utilizing a practitioner of the healing arts. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
